price: 他们俩的结局，是同入火狱，而永居其中；那是不义者的报酬。
arabic: فَكَانَ عَٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدَيۡنِ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fakāna ʿāqibatahumā annahumā fī al-nāri khālidayni fīhā wadhālika jazāu al-ẓālimīna
